update hr_staff_leave
LEAVE_ID = #{record.leaveId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DEPT_ID = #{record.createDeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
